name: Suzannah
overview:
Suzannah creates beautiful tailored designer dresses inspired by vintage couture. Shop online for Suzannah’s cocktail, evening and day dresses and glamorous coats tailor-made by London fashion designer Suzannah Crabb.

Inspired by vintage couture, British designer Suzannah has created a label to covet. Parisian chic with a subtle NYC twist, the label is vibrant with effortlessly beautiful pieces that draw on the sublime tailoring and fabrics of haute couture. Heralded particularly for her fabulous dresses - from cocktail dresses, tea dresses, work dresses and boutique dresses to evening wear â€“ Suzannah also offers bespoke tailoring, gorgeous daywear, outwear and separates. Perfect for breakfasting at Tiffanyâ€™s, lunching Lower East Side and cocktails aux Champs-Elysees.
